osgART::PlaneARShadowRenderer

osgART::PlaneARShadowRenderer Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for osgART::PlaneARShadowRenderer:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This class support V -> R AR lighting based on a semi-transparent virtual plane. it can be use for doing AR on the table or on tangible Marker. REM: actually only supporting one light.
